name: Verify PUT request by valid program name with ONLY mandatory fields for already existing data using DDT

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User set request for Program module with valid base url and valid request body by valid program name
When  When User sends PUT request with ONLY mandatory fields from "ProgramPUTValidData" and 1
Then  Request should be successfull with status code 200 and updated response body
